title: New: HAPPY TRENDY – January 6
body:
Ahead of his upcoming EU tour with **Foxes In Fiction**, synth-pop maestro **HAPPY TRENDY** has dropped a new cut (premiered via our friends at [BIRP](http://www.birp.fm/blog/5594-premiere-happy-trendy-january-6)) set to feature on next’s week _**Die Young EP**_. _January 6_ is a glitchy lo-fi tune, seeing **Dylan Khotin-Foote** and **Rachel Levy** doubling up on vocal duties. Sonically, it brings about memories of **Casiotone For The Painfully Alone**, albeit bringing the sound into a more modern perspective. “_Barely slept last night, half awake, eyes half closed, as the sun hits your face_” being one particular moment that’s as heartbreaking as it is uplifting. Check out _January 6_ below, available via [Orchid Tapes](http://orchidtapes.blogspot.com/) on November 20, as well as **HAPPY TRENDY**‘s full set of EU tour dates with **Foxes In Fiction**.

[Happy Trendy – January 6](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/11/02-January-6.mp3)

November 30th – Porto, Portugal – Passos Manuel  
December 1st – Coimbra, Portugal – Oficina Municipal do Teatro  
December 3rd – Lisbon, Portugal – Vodafone Mexefest / Terraço Hotel Tivoli  
December 4th – Madrid, Spain – TBA  
December 5th – Lyon, France – La Triperie  
December 6th – Paris, France – L’espace B  
December 7th – Lille, France – Peek-A-Boo  
December 8th – Haarlem, Netherlands – Geertruida  
December 9th – Oslo, Norway – Sound of Mu  
December 10th – Berlin, Germany – Mme Claude  
December 11th – Leipzig, Germany – Wächterhaus  
December 12th – Hamburg, Germany – Astra-Stube

[DIE YOUNG](http://vimeo.com/31666433) from [Orchid Tapes](http://vimeo.com/orchidtapes) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
